name: Toys Battleon
description: In this version of Battleon you play as toy soldier that must fight off a wave of enemy drones attacking your home. Battleon is a free 3D first-person shooter. An io game inspired by game like voxiom minecraft and pixel warfare you can play it on browser, no download, and free! Jump into the arena How to Play Movement: W, A, S, D  Shoot: Left Mouse Aim: Right Mouse Jump: Space
